name: Super Secret Santa
description:
Recommendation: Do not play in full-screen mode

The game was made during the "32bit Holiday Jam 2021" jam in 10 days so we tried to produce a very retro, 32bit looking game.

In the game you play as Santa and put presents under the christmas tree of multiple homes without getting noticed by lurking children wanting to catch you. This means you have to sneak around searching for the christmas tree but also avoid the children and the traps they put up for you!

Controls:
Move with WASD-Control
Jump with space
Sprint by holding shift
Press escape to get to the menu

Credits:
Art - Mark
Game Design - Florian Großmann
Programming - Moritz von Basum

External Assets:
Music - Potalex
Sounds:
     - Child Voice: Christoph
     - Chicken by: mixmasterdylan

     - bell by: danarobinsondesignsgmailcom
